Dear Jai, 

Welcome to the PuffTracker. My job is to enable you to monitor and keep track of the number of cigarettes you smoke during the day, and keep giving you systematic suggestions upon the rate at which you should decrease your intake.


My final goal is to liberate you from this habit, so that you can get back to singing your way through life and lead a retirement full of health and vitality, when you eventually get there.


However, I can only help you if you allow me to help you. So you must promise me that everytime you light a cigarette, you will open me up and record the cigarette that you just smoked.
"You have successfully taken your first step towards a smoke free life ahead"

Hi Jai,\n\nClick on the buring cigarette above every time you light a cigarette and I will take care of the rest! I am starting you off with a generous limit of 20 cigerettes per day. You will be rewarded handsomely everytime you fall short of your limit. We will gradually work our way down.
Your son has put in a lot of time and effort into making me for you. If you won\'t allow me to help you, I will send your son an sms notifying him about his effort going in vain.
Your father is not ready to take the smoke-free journey yet!
It\'s now or never, Jai. Take the leap!
I have detected that you are not connected to the internet. Please try again after you are connected.
